Every single instinct he had was screaming at him, telling him to flee as fast as he could and a few of the “intellectual” parts of his mind were agreeing with them as he remembered how Minerva was portrayed in the cartoons. Up” Whether the emphasis on the later words was purposeful or not, the combination of the words and the fact that Minerva had a lot more canines in her large white smile than he was expecting caused Jake’s instincts to win out over his intelligence. Quickly finding his back against Minerva’s long slender fingers Jake couldn’t do anything but wait as Minerva’s fingers closed in on him and much to his surprise ever so gently stroked carefully down his head and back.

“You didn’t think I was going to hurt you did I?” Minerva’s voice was surprisingly quiet and sounded almost pained, like his reaction had hurt her.

Minerva’s massive golden tail trailed down to and formed a small pile of smooth silken fur on the floor; he could feel her large soft eyes examining every inch of his body as “phew” she gently blew a few strands of golden hair out of her face. Every inch of Minerva’s silky smooth fur and soft flowing locks seemed to sparkle and shine in her home’s natural light, as he admittedly stared for several seconds. “I should really be better at taking a compliment, I mean I am an actress after all” Minerva replied, her head turning back to Jake as her vision focused upon him “but something about your words, they just feel so sincere.” Eyes focused completely on Mineva’s smiling face Jake was caught off-guard as one of her fingers began to gently stroke over his back, the smooth furred digit barely exerting any force yet he could feel the weight and warmth of the digit easily through his shirt. “You said that you were an actress….I might be completely wrong about this, but are you THE Minerva Mink?” Jake despite himself felt a small amount of reverence enter his voice as he talked about Minerva even though he was talking to her. He was surprised by Minerva’s reaction however as her entire body seemed to tense a gentle sigh escaping her lips.

“Yes I’m Minerva Mink….I’m sure you’ve seen my work then?” Minerva’s entire body seemed to sag, her ears and tail drooping as it was like he’d come to discover some sort of deep dark secret.

“Well….yeah, and I’ll admit you’re acting a bit different than you do in the roles, but they’re just roles right? “Ting” Minerva’s tail suddenly stood straight up like an exclamation mark as her expression became quite sultry. He tried to back up as Minerva slowly leaned towards him, her face looming ever closer until “Mmmmhmmm” her soft lips pressed against him in a gentle kiss that lasted for several seconds before she pulled back. “Not only are you cute, but you’re smart….you’re the first guy to ever figure out I’m not how I act in my movies isn’t that funny?” Despite her best attempts pain was obvious in Minerva’s voice and similarly written across her face. What she’d gone through because someone thought she was simply some shallow bitch thanks to seeing her cartoons was something Jake wasn’t sure he’d ever know. “Now, let’s talk about what we’re going to do with you” Minerva practically purred as her palm was quickly brought to above her voluptuous chest. “I don’t have anywhere else to carry you, and you’re not going to tell me that my breasts are uncomfortable are you?” Jake wasn’t sure what he was supposed to say in reply to that, Minerva’s eyes fell upon him “well?” she continued, an angry undercurrent characterizing her voice.

“I….they’re very comfortable” he replied softly, his voice barely above a whisper. Lowering his gaze he was caught off-guard by Minerva’s finger gently stroking over his head.

“I’m glad you like them, and hopefully you’ll like my home just as much. Now let’s show you around” Minerva’s voice was soft and controlled as she began to walk. Resigning himself to being stuck where he was, after several seconds of wiggling and a pause from Minerva, Jake was able to orient himself so he was looking out over her cleavage and towards the room as a whole. As Minerva began her “tour” her latest actions brought several questions to mind, but the most obviously pressing one was why she was being so kind. Minerva leans back a bit a smiles "shhh, just let me take care of you" she says before kissing you again. She wraps her hands behind you puts her whole self into the kiss. You can't help but smile "thank you" you think thanking whatever higher power let you have this joy. Minerva lets up after a minute but you stay in the little groove in the pillow, looking up. "Where'd Jack go?" she asks, "oh well" she shrugs and walks over to a closet, you see her back as she takes off her dress and puts on a purple and pink robe. She walks back up and hugs the pillow to her stomach, flopping down so you're head was just under her belly button. You're just able to reach an arm up and you tap her stomach, she lifts herself up and looks down at you, "oh there you are" she says smiling mischeviously. "Well since you're down there how about you give me a belly rub" Minerva says laying back down. You mumble under you're breath for a second before starting to rub, you heard Minerva give off a sigh and you were fearful for a second as it felt like her weight increased before it went back to the bearable level it was now. As you rubbed, you started sniffing and that's when you realized you were surrounded by her scent, she smelt like flower petals, the forest, and slighlty like soap. You lean forward to get more of her scent and you rub against Minerva's belly button and much to her suprise you hear her start giggling.

"Minerva are you ticklish" you yell.

"Of course not, it's just fun to have you under there" she replies. You lean forward and lick her belly button and you hear her start laughing and you smile. You rub her belly for a bit before Minerva pulls you out from under her and smiles at you. "Thanks for the rub" she says laying down on the pillow and smiling at you.

"No problem, it was my pleasure" you reply sitting down and facing her. "Minerva you smell nice, like flowers" you say smiling.

"Oh...thank you" Minerva says blushing a bit. She pulls you forward and gently snuggles you into her chest, "you can smell me all you want" she whispers before she starts stroking you're back with one finger. "Mmmmm" you reply, you curl up and fall asleep right there, surrounded by her warmth. You wake up and Minerva's staring at you, she smiles as she realizes you're up and you stretch. "Morning" you say.

"Morning" she replies crawling forward so she's right in front of you, she leans forward and you kiss her pink nose. "Good, you did know what I wanted" she says smiling, "you really are a good caretaker" she says.,

"Anything for you" you reply smiling.

"Hmmmm well I think it's about time you were rewarded.....now how should I?" she says. Sitting up and holding a finger to her chin she thinks for a moment, "I know, you and me and a little church" she says smiling.

"What?" you say. Minerva gets up, walks over to a desk and pulls out a small box. She puts it in front of you "open it" she says.

"No way this is happening, no way" you think while opening the box. Inside was a ring, it was bigger then you were around, "so where'd you get the ring?" you ask.

"Actually I was the one who bought it, i've kept it as a reminder of how mean men can be" Minerva says.

"So you're giving it to me to get rid of it?" you ask not able to process the alternative.

"No silly" she says, she picks up the box and smiles "will you be mine, forever and ever?" she asks.

"A....are you proposing to me?" you ask.

"Yes....now come on don't keep me waiting" she says.

"B...b...but i've barely known you a day, and I could still betray you and..." you're shushed as Minerva's tail falls around you and she holds one finger to you're mouth.

"Is it a yes, or a no?" she asks staring at you with her large eyes.

"Of course yes, but why?" you ask honestly confused.

"Well as I said before you're the nicest guy i've ever met, even though i've known you for maybe a day you've treated me so well and not because I bullied you or seduced you but because you care for me, I even tested you earlier and you passed beautifully. So after you fell asleep I thought about it and thought about it, and I figured something out, you've made me happier in the last day then most guys have made me in a year. I don't want to lose that, I don't want to lose you, because I think i'm falling in love with you" she says. You nearly have a heart attack over what you were hearing but you do faint, You wake up a small time later with Minerva looking over you, "wakey wakey" she says smiling.

"Augh, I had a weird dream, you well proposed to me" you say trying to convince yourself of you're own words.

"It wasn't a dream" Minerva says holding up the ring box, she leans over and smiles at you "so since you already said yes we should probably start preparing" Minerva says.

"Preparing for what?" you say.

"Well first the ceremony, then the reception, then our life together and eventually the pitter-patter of little paws" Minerva says looking away dreamily at the last bit.

"Is that last one even possible?" you ask.

"We'll just have to try and find out" Minerva says smiling at you mischeviously.

"Just...just give me a second to take this all in" you say.

"Why is this such a shock?" Minerva asks.

"I've loved you for I don't know how many years, now you're in front of me and saying you love me too, it's just i'm so happy i'm not thinking correctly" you say. She pushes you over with one finger and smiles "well you'll have the rest of our lives to figure out it's real" she says laying her head down next to you. You turn over and she smiles at you, you can't help but smile back and she sighs "thank you Jack" she says.

"Huh, thanks for what?" you ask.

"I had given up, on ever finding someone, until you showed up in my house, i'll admit at first I was angry at you, but you started making me fall for you the moment you first spoke to me and were so kind" Minerva says.

"Thanks, i'm glad you're so happy Minerva" you say. She smiles even more and cuddles you against her cheek "that's what I love about you" she says. You lay on her cheek for a bit hugging her with one arm and gently stroking her with you're free one. You jump down and sit in front of her, you smile at her and she smiles back.

"Jack, you're going to have to meet my parents" Minerva says.

"Alright, although I honestly thought most animals lost contact with their parents when they grew up" you say.

"Yeah well my parents came back into my life once they heard about what happened with wolf boy" Minerva says. "It's going to be hard to introduce you, but we'll figure it out somehow" Minerva says.

"It's going to be hard why?" you ask.

"Well they're very judgemental, and not only are you not a mink, you're kind of small" Minerva says.

"You don't mind my size do you?" you ask.

"No, it just makes you easier to cuddle with" Minerva says hugging you.

"But don't you wish I could well wrap my arms around you and just hold you tight?" you ask.

"Yes, a bit, but the other advantages of having you small are worth it" Minerva says.

"What advantages?" you ask, Minerva just smiles at you and doesn't reply.

"What advantages?" you ask again.

"Well it's about time to get up and make some breakfast" Minerva says changing the subject. She grabs you and gently drops you on top of her chest, before walking out of the bedroom and into the kitchen, bounce a bit as she takes each step and you can't help but smile.
15112121.title: in a very loving way

151121211.content:
Minerva enters the kitchen and puts you down on the table before grabbing some bacon which she starts to fry. You thought about continuing to ask her about the advantages but you decided to just drop it. Minerva finished the bacon in a minute and sat down cutting off a piece which she handed to you. You ate it happily getting a bit of grease on you which much to you're suprise Minerva licks off you.

"Can I have a drink?" you ask. Minerva nods and grabs a saucer which she fills with a small amount of milk. You happily drink the milk although you did look a bit like a cat as you drank it. Without a word once you finished Minerva put the plate away, went back into her room and got changed into her trademark red dress, came back and picked you up and put you on her shoulder and walked out the door. She walked for a minute before the silence started to bug you. "Minerva what's wrong?" you ask.

"Wrong...n-n-nothing's wrong" she stammers.

"Ok, that's something i've never heard, seriously what's wrong?" you ask.

"I'm scared, my parents are both huge hunters and you're well, you're a human but you're very.....prey sized" she says.

"Don't worry, I trust you" you say. Minerva smiles at you and pats you on the head, "thanks" she says. It was suprisingly only a 10 minute walk to her parents house, like hers it was a giant log with a window and a door cut into it. Minerva slowly opens the door and walks in, "Mom, you home?" she yells grabbing you and hiding you in her dress. You stick you're head out over the top edge of the dress and you see another mink walk in. You could easily tell where Minerva got her looks from as her mother looked great, not as god as Minerva but still very nice. From a side corridor came another mink carrying a newspaper, "the daily root" it read. Minerva notices you're head sticking out and quickly pushes you back into her dress, "Mom, Dad we need to talk" Minerva says.You felt her walk and sit down. "Mom, Dad, i'm well i'm seeing someone" Minerva says.

"Hunnie that's great, but you better not go too quickly" Mrs. Mink says.

"It's ok mom, this guy is really nice, and even though he's had a lot of chances to take advantage of me, but he hasn't" Minerva replies.

"Well that's good" Mr. Mink replies.

"Would you like to meet him?" Minerva asks hopefully.

"Sure, we'll expect him in the hour" Mrs. Mink says.Minerva reaches into her dress and pulls you out, "Mom, Dad this my boyfriend Jack" she says holding you up. You look up to see 2 huge mink faces looking at you, although unhappily they had a look of hunger in their eyes. Minerva pulls you close to her chest and glares at her parents. "Mom, Dad, leave him alone" she says.

"Minerva, what is that thing, it looks like a hairless mouse" Mr.Mink says.

"He's a human, and he's been my admirer for a long time" Minerva replies.

Mrs. Mink leans over and the look of hunger leaves her eyes, "wow, he's actually kind of cute" she says.

"Thanks mom, I think" Minerva says, Minerva sets you down in her lap and her father sits opposite in a chair while her mother sits down net to her.

"So, what's different about this little guy?" Mr. Mink asks.

"Well he's kind, funny, he actually cares about me" Minerva says.

"Oh pssh look at him, he's so small even with you fully clothed he's probably just non-stop staring at you and having dirty fantasies" Mr. Mink says.

"Actually dad, I already tested that, I offered to take a shower with him, I mean what better chance right?" she says, "anyways he said he didn't want to, he actually tried to run in the other direction before I stopped him" Minerva continues.

"So, one example does not make a man" Mr .Mink says.

"Dad he spent 20 minutes brushing my hair and my tail, and half an hour giving me a massage, I don't think he wants to take advantage of me" Minerva argues.

"I still don't trust him" Mr. Mink says.

"Hey, what do I call you" you pipe up.

"I'm Thomas" Mr. Mink replies.

"Jack, glad to make you're acquaintance" you say standing up. "So you're problem is you think i'm gonna betray you're daughter, why?" you ask.

"Well she's always had trust issues, the guys never trusted her as much as she trusted them" Thomas says.

"I can't believe i'm doing this" you think. "What if I proved I trusted her" you say.

"That would be acceptable" Thomas says.

"Minerva can you lift me up?" you ask. Minerva lifts you up to eye level. "Do you trust me?" you ask and she nods, "well then open you're mouth" you say and she stares at you horrified. "Look this isn't easy on my end easier, so please just do it" you say and Minerva opens her jaws. You walk in past her teeth which were like mini rock formations to you and you sit down on her tongue, "a minute good?" you ask. Minerva's father had frozen, "uh yeah sure" he says. "Ok close it" you say and you were plunged into darkness. You felt Minerva's breath all around you, it was wet yet actually kind of warm. You just sat there letting the seconds tick by, finally after what felt thankfully like a minute Minerva opens her mouth and pulls you out. Her father was staring at you stunned as well as her mother. Minerva lifts you up to eye level and she seems quite angry, "don't you ever, ever do that again" she yells causing you to cover you're ears. Her eyes soften and she hugs you into her chest, "you scared me half to death, if I made one wrong move...I..I...i'd lose you" she says sniffling.

"Minerva it's ok, I had complete trust in you" you say burying you're head in her chest. You heard a sound and you turn to see Thomas stand up and walk over, he bends down and stares at you before extending a paw. "You have guts, trust, and most of all you truly seem to care for my daughter unlike those other sleazebags, I accept, welcome to the family" he says. You turn around and shake his paw happy as can be. You felt a tap and looked up to see Minerva's mother looking down at you, "i'm Felicity, i'll be you're new mother-in-law" she says happily. "Thanks" you say not able to say much else. Minerva puts you down on the couch, "me and mom are gonna make wedding preparations you and Dad can talk for a bit" she says getting up and following her mother into the kitchen. You look up at Thomas and you had to admit you were a bit unnerved by the guy even backing up a step, Thomas notices this and smiles, "don't worry, i'm not going to eat you, my daughter seems to really like you" he says.

"Yeah, well i've liked her for a long time" you say.

"Oh yeah, how long?" he asks.

"I think I saw the show on my 5th birthday so a little over 13 years" you reply.

"Wow, that's a long time to hold a crush" he replies.

"Honestly never thought i'd meet her, but it was a bit hard" you reply.

"Well i'm expecting you to take good care of her, even if you're a bit....small" he says.

"Can do, so I can see where Minerva gets her body from" you say.

"Yeah, Felicity's great, fell for her the moment I saw her, sadly that was before I moved away in elementary school, didn't see her again till college" Thomas says.

"We've got something in common" you say and you both laugh as you realized you did.
151121211.title: Breakfast then her parents house

1511212111.content:
You're standing at the altar waiting for your bride. You see her father come out with her and she looks gorgeous. She has a beautiful snow white silk veil and dress on. She gets to the altar and you say your vows.

Where do you go now?
1511212111.title: Skip to the wedding

choices: Skip to when you have kids
1511212112.content:
The next few weeks were quite hectic, you were introduced to so many members of Minerva's family it wasn't even funny. She had 50 cousins alone along with their parents and any other acquaintances that might have been close enough to attend the wedding, this was going to be one very packed church. Nothing really major happened until the party which was supposed to be Minerva's all-female party but she wouldn't let you out of her sight so it was just a regular party. You were sitting on the refreshment table as Minerva had to go to the bathroom when a mink that looked like Minerva's twin except she had black hair instead of blond walked up.

"Hi" she says.

"Hi" you reply.

"I'm Shelly, Minerva's cousin, wow so she really is marrying a really small human" she says leaning forward.

"Yeah, it's a dream come true" you reply. She leans further and you notice that she keeps smiling, but it's a creepy kind of smile.

"So what do you like so much about my cousin?" she asks.

"I don't know, she's pretty, smart, kind" you say. Shelly nods, "well you know you could always dump my cousin and come with me" she says.

You looked up at her stunned but politely reply "no that's fine, Minerva's the only girl for me."

"I wasn't asking" Shelly says starting to reach for you.

"Shelly" you heard a voice yell and in a second you were picked up and nestled in 2 large mounds held in a red dress. "What do you think your doing with my Jack?" Minerva says.

"Oh looks who's here, Ms. everyone loves me because I’m hot, I’m pretty much your twin except the hair and no guy has ever wanted to go out with me, so I decided to take the one guy who actually seems to matter to you" Shelly says staring at you and Minerva holds you tighter.

"Guys don't want to go out with you Shelly because frankly your a bitch" Minerva says practically growling. You looked up at her and then at Shelly and you knew this was not the place you wanted to be at this moment. You saw a glint in Shelly's eye and throwing caution to the wind you jumped back towards the refreshment table, good thing too as right after you did you heard one girl connect with the other. You just landed on the side of the table and you had to scramble to get up but you made it. You turned around to see the 2 rolling around at on the floor tearing at each other's clothes, pulling on hair and tails, scratching at face, it was a regular cat fight. There was no one around so you did the stupidest thing you could do, you shimmied down the leg of the table and ran toward the dance floor. It wasn't hard to find Thomas as he was wearing one of those stupid disco outfits, you ran toward him dodging pans and other limbs until you reached his leg. You grabbed his leg and started climbing, thankfully however he noticed the sensation, looked down and spotted you. He picks you up between 2 fingers and lifts you up "hey what are you doing over here, it's dangerous" he says.

"Minerva, Shelly, cat-fight" you say pointing towards where they were. Thomas nods and holding you in a palm he runs over to the refreshment table, puts you down and pulls the 2 girls off each other. "Hey, hey break it up" he says. The two girls look at each other still very angry and Thomas stands between them "ok what's going on here" he says.

"She was trying to steal Jack" Minerva says.

"She doesn't deserve a nice guy, she's gotten enough chances" Shelly replies. Minerva freezes and looks around "hey where is he" she says.

"Don't worry he's ok, he came and got me, little nut ran out onto the dance floor to get me" Thomas says. Shelly just turns and walks away, you wave and Minerva quickly walks up, scoops you up and hugs you. "Thanks for getting my dad" she says.

"No problem, but look at you, do you know how much brushing I’m going to have to do to fix this" you say indicating her fur.

Minerva giggles "thanks for always looking out for me" she says and she gently kisses you. The party was pretty uneventful after that and true to your word it took you probably a good 2 hours to fix everything Shelly had messed up and that included cleaning and bandaging the cuts. You fell asleep nestled against Minerva's cheek with one hand gently placed on top of you. You woke up the next day to her beautiful smile and she gently kissed you "well today's the big day" she says. You nodded and she put a doll's tuxedo down on the bed "no peeking" she says standing up. You dive under the covers and start getting changed into the tuxedo. It only took you a minute and every few seconds you'd look out and see her tail swish around as she moved around. You felt her touch the bed and you crawled out and were stunned. Minerva was standing there in a traditional wedding dress veil and all, well except for the ear and tail holes. She gently lifted you up and smiled at you "you look quite handsome" she says.

"Minerva your easily the most beautiful thing i've ever seen" you reply and you saw her blush slightly under the veil. "Hey isn't it bad luck to see the bride before a wedding?" you ask.

"Not when she's your transportation" Minerva replies and before you can stop her she nestles you into her dress so just your head was sticking out and she starts walking. You sighed and just got comfy. It only took her a few minutes to walk to the church and she hummed the whole way, she met her father at the front who looked around. "So where is he?" he asks.

"Oh he's close" Minerva says. Thomas with a grin on his face opens the church doors and leads Minerva up to the altar while "Here comes the bride" plays. The priest looks her over and somehow he doesn't notice you either "uh where is the man your supposed to be marrying?" he asks.

"Right here" Minerva replies pulling you out. You heard a gasp from the front row and you heard someone yell from the back "lucky bastard."

"Ehem yes well other then our couple's strange entrance if there is anyone who objects to this matrimony speak now or forever hold your peace" the priest says. You saw a lot of the people who Minerva had gone gaga over yet they were all silent.

"Ahem well then do you take this woman to have and to hold till death do you part?" the priest asks you.

"I do" you reply.

"Do you take this man to have and to hold till death do you part" the priest asks Minerva laughing a bit at the small irony.

"I do" she replies quickly.

"Well then you may exchange rings and kiss the bride" he says. Thomas walks up and hands Minerva 2 rings, she slips one over you and is about to slip the other one on when you stop her. Struggling to hold the ring up as gold is actually quite heavy you slip it onto her finger, Minerva lifts you up and you share your first kiss as husband and wife. The church erupted into cheers and clapping "Thank you Jack, you've made me so happy" Minerva whispers tears streaming down her face.

"That makes two of us Minerva" you reply reaching up and brushing as many of her tears aside as you can. She giggles and kisses you again and that was the start of your marriage.
1511212112.title: Go over the preparations

15112121122.content:
You wake up slowly, and as soon as you realize the date you smile slightly. You look up at Minerva's still sleeping face and smile "happy 1 year anniversary" you whisper. The tranquility of the morning was broken by the sound of crying, and Minerva slowly sat up, "uhh, what time is it?" she asks.

"7:00am, but Cassy and Chris say it's feeding time" you reply climbing up onto her shoulder. Minerva slowly stood up and walked over to your twin's room, Minerva although still obviously half-asleep smiled your 2, 3 month old twins as her eyes rested on them. "Hello my little darlings" she says lifting them up one in each arm. "They're almost as cute as their mother" you say laying against her neck as the familiar sound of the 2 suckling fills your ears.

"You little flatterer" she replies before yawning, "oh sorry" she says.

"No problem, happy anniversary Minerva" you whisper. Minerva gives off a quite excited squeal "you remembered" she says, she probably would have hugged you right then if she wasn't holding the twins, and as soon as she put them back down in their crib and was free that's exactly what she did. She hugged you to her cheek for a few seconds before giving you a gentle kiss, "I still can't believe we had kids, let alone twins" she says smiling.

"Yeah, one in a million, shows what doctors know" you reply.

"Or your just one in a million" Minerva replies which you had to admit caused you to blush a little. Minerva smiles down at you in her palm and she walks back into the bedroom, you had gotten used to getting up this early as Minerva had to be at her modeling job by 8:00. She promised when she started that there'd be no underwear or nude shots, but you still secretly stole and went over all the samples she brought home. You were only about 4 inches tall but you still worried about her. Minerva sets you down and gently strokes your back with 1 finger "hey shouldn't I be giving you a brush down" you say.

"Pooh to that, it's our anniversary" she says.

"So your just going to go to work like that?" you ask. She didn't look bad but she had well "bed fur" and you had to do a lot to keep from laughing.

"Alright you can straighten it, I swear you take more pride in my appearance than I do" Minerva says. You'd never admit it but you kind of did, making sure Minerva looked her best was one of the few things you could do, so you did actually take real pride in keeping Minerva looking her best. Minerva grabs a brush from the dresser, discards the robe she wore around the house and lays out on the bed putting the brush down beside her. You still couldn't believe she had been able to stay in shape, and you still stared "like what you see?" Minerva says shaking her butt a bit.

"Y-Yes" you reply a bit flustered, you grab the brush and get straight to work to try to keep yourself from only thinking about well her cute butt.

"Do you know how hard it is to lose baby fat" Minerva says like she hadn't said it a hundred times.

"No, I wouldn't have minded if you were a few pounds heavier" you reply.

"What? I can't lose my gorgeous figure, why else would you stay with me?" Minerva says jokingly.

"Oh I don't know, your impulsive attitude, that beautiful singing voice, the caring you showed me when we first met" you reply. Minerva quieted until you jumped off her and put the brush down then she quickly rolled over and hugs you to her chest "that's why I love you Jack, you love me for more than my body" she says. The two of you just lay like that for a bit savoring the moment before Minerva lets you go. "Now no peeking" she says as she walks over to the dresser, although you couldn't help yourself you watched her walk, that beautiful golden tail swinging seductivley behind her. She quickly gets dressed and turns back smiling as she sees you don't even try to hide the fact you were watching "little peeping tom" she says picking you up.

"What can I say, it's the best view in the world" you reply and she smiles. She put you down on top of her dresser and you grabbed some clothes, although they were only doll's clothes and you know you felt Minerva's gaze on you as you changed. You turned to see her smiling up at you, "now who's the peeping tom?" you say climbing down onto her palm. Minerva laughs slightly and the two of you head out into the kitchen. You had a quick meal of toast and some eggs before Minerva left her job. However this day she said something different as she left "goodbye my little love." This shouldnt' have been a big deal but you latched onto it and over-analyzed it all day, only stopping when Minerva came home for lunch and once her shift was over around 5:00. Dinner was a very simple fare, just steak and vegetables, thankfully the twins had been quite most of the day so you had been able to stew, or well maybe not so thankfully. Once your finished you sigh and Minerva looks down at you "what's wrong?" she asks.

"Nothing" you reply.

"Jack, I've known you for a year and there's something wrong, what?" Minerva asks.

"I'll tell you once your finished" you say. Minerva nods and quickly finishes her supper before moving the two of you over to the bedroom so she could lay out.

"Alright what's wrong?" she asks.

"Minerva, am I inadequate?" you ask.

"What?" she replies.

"I mean, we haven't well, done it since our wedding" you say.

Minerva smiles "that's normal, most couples are more worried about their children rather than their sex lives" she says.

"Minerva, I know this is kind of personal, but how big were they?" you ask.

"Pardon?" she replies.

"How big, were the guys you slept with before me? I don't care about the act, but just tell me please" you say.

MInerva looks stunned for a few seconds then stops to think, after a few seconds she quietly replies "your entire body is the smallest thing I've taken" she says.

You sighed, I mean you had guessed that as you were only 4 inches tall. Still it just kind of hit you like a hammer blow, you just stared at her for a few seconds. Minerva looks at you and then lifts you up "Jack I don'd care about that" she says. You look away suddenly feeling asahamed and Minerva lifts you up to face level "Jack, sex with you is the best I've ever had, not because of phsical please but because you love me inside and out, both figurativley and literally. Yes I had sex with those other men, but you are the only guy I have or ever will make love to, because you are the only one I have ever truly loved" she says. You hugged Minerva's cheek tears and she gently rubbed against you, you were so caught up in the moment you didn't even notice Minerva's nimble fingers gently removing your clothes till she tugged at your shirt. You looked at her and she smiled that mischevious smile only she could pull off, "take your shirt off love" she says. You slowly take it off and she moves and puts it with your other clothes before pushing the whole pile off to a corner of the bed.

Minerva smiles and before you can stop her she licked your leg and said "this is mine", then she did the same with your other leg. She licked every part of you one piece at a time till you were covered in her spit and then she gently pushed the tip of her muzzle against your crotch "and this is also mine" she states with a final affectionate lick. "Minerva what are you doing?" you ask as she lets you sit up.

"Just claiming what's mine" she says before kissing you her lips pressing against your body for a few seconds. She giggles afterwards and says with mock concern "Oh Jack your all wet, well you'll just have to sleep very close to me to keep warm," She puts you down between her mounds and pulls the sheet up, she then holds you in place and turns over her whole body becoming a ball as she curls up. "I love you Jack, never forget that" she whispers to you.

"I love you too Minerva, and our kids" you reply.

"Yes and I love Chris and Cassy" she replies before planting one final kiss on the top of your head.

"Happy aniversary" you whisper up to her.

"Happy anniversary" she replies, those words being the last you hear before you fall asleep her warm breath washing over you and her heartbeat soothing you.
15112121122.title: Skip to when you have kids

151121211221.content:

“Get back here you little Stinker!” Minerva screamed as you assume she's giving chase to you. You go to run under the couch, seeing that she won't be able to get you there. However her large white furry foot/paw stopped you. Crashing in front of you.

“Stopped You!!” Minerva yelled in victory as you waste no time turning around. However you didn't make that much distance as her other foot stopped you in your path.

“Run all you want, Your too small to get away” Minerva said, that however didn't stop you as you try to run another direction. However your stopped by Minerva once again by her foot, this time instead of just blocking your path, it came down directly on top of you, pinning you down to the ground. You struggle as her Toes were directly above you. Minerva smiling evilly lowered her big Toe onto your face as you start suffocating. Losing breath you start struggling even more, Thankfully Minerva lifted her toe from you as you take a breath of relief.

“Your lucky I'm letting you live, if i wanted to i could stomp out you life right now” Minerva threatened as stares down to you with a look of disgust.

“I Swear this is not what it loo-” You were cut of mid sentence as she silenced you with her big toe once again . This time with it only covering your mouth, not your eyes or nose.

“I don't want to hear your lies. You made the mistake of peeing on me, so i think I'm going to make you pay for that by keeping you as my new _________

15132.content:
“Please listen to me, I don't know how i got here. I just kind of teleported here!” you shout to her frightened beyond belief.

“Hah, do you think I'm going to believe that. You'd say anything to avoid being my slave” Minerva said still thinking your lying.

“I promise its true! I Was just watching an episode of you in it and-” you stop suddenly when you realised you stupidly just said the worst thing you could possibly say. She covers your mouth with her toe while looking at you angrily.

“See, you pretty much confessed that you've been peeping on me! I should take care of you right now, maybe suffocate you between my toes.” Minerva said. scaring you as you struggle to no avail. “But I'm going to keep you, as my slave whether you like it or not. You Probably do, after all if you were lovestruck enough to shrink yourself and spy on me, then your lovestruck enough to be my little slave boy”

Minerva then lifted her toe and foot off of you as she places it down in front “Please. . . Just please” You say

“If you keep trying to lie to me, I'm going to punish you. Understood” Minerva said seriously.

You've given up, at least for now. Just do what she says and try to get out safe and in one piece. “Understood Minerva”

“No, people worth caring about call me Minerva. Your going to Call me Mistress Minerva”

“Yes Mistress Minerva” You say a bit relunctent.

Minerva smiled as she sat back down onto the couch “Good, it seems after your initial spat, you've gotten yourself in line. Now I'm going to finish putting on my make up.” She says as she grabs her make up once again and start applying it on her face “While I'm doing this your going to ________________”

“Yes Mistress Minerva”
